short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fetches and displays the last, bid, and ask prices of Bitcoin.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This will grab API data from Bitfinex's public API and display the Bid, Ask, and Last Price in a nice little window.  You can also turn on automatic refresh, which grabs the price every half-second.  This is an open source project: https://github.com/wijagels/btc-price-check
Theme by Tim Hung
